sentences.en: But they can produce useable optical and infrared data.
sentences.cn: 但是它们可以提供可用的光学和红外数据。

sentences.en: Entangling roots will be useable indoor. to help druids get into heroic groups.
sentences.cn: 纠缠根须室内可用. 让德鲁伊在英雄副本队伍中更受欢迎.

sentences.en: For every container it displays ID, name, type, total pages, useable pages, and whether the container is currently accessible or not.
sentences.cn: 而对于每个容器，它将显示其 ID、名称、类型、可用的页以及该容器当前是否可被访问。

sentences.en: Increases in stock of useable knowledge lead to increase in output.
sentences.cn: 有用的知识的积累导致土地产出的增加.

sentences.en: Many guidelines exist to aid in the creation of useable graphical interfaces, but few exist to guide the co-development of accessible interfaces.
sentences.cn: 有很多指导原则可以帮助创建可用的图形化界面，但是很少能够为同时开发可访问界面提供帮助。

sentences.en: Proper design of stir will improve the field uniformity and lower the minimum useable frequency.
sentences.cn: 合理设计的搅拌器会改善混响室的场均匀性、降低最低可用频率.

sentences.en: Quite frankly this cable is very useable and would function as intended.
sentences.cn: 毫无疑问,这种电缆很有用并将发挥它应有的功能.

sentences.en: The only joystick buttons that were useable were buttons 1 through 4 and the throttle.
sentences.cn: 摇杆上能用的只有1-4号键及快杆.

sentences.en: Travel Form is no longer useable underwater.
sentences.cn: 旅行形态不能再用于水下.

words.tran_cn: 习惯的；二手的，使用过的
有用的，有益的；有帮助的
可用的；便于使用的（等于usable）

trans.tran_cn: 可用的，合用的，便于使用的
